title: "Large language models can elevate the life insurance customer experience"
excerpt: "There always will be new technologies that can revolutionize how things are done across sectors, but the insurance industry should not fail to act on large language models. Life insurers must consider what people and jobs would need to be involved to enable the use of large language models and develop a road map for integration."
